name: Thanks to God Foundation

address: No. 1 AA, Nandhanar Colony, 2nd street, L.F (Kumuli) Road

briefDescription: 1. Eliminating farmer suicide in our work domain.2. Save the nature for our generation by planting trees and harvesting rainwater.3. Technology transfer from research centers to farmers.4. Sustainable livelihood at village level.5. Humanity Education to children and secure their future.6. Build the social network, “Friends for Nature Revival” by social awareness media.
